titleStmt.title: Announement by Judge Joseph E. Lee. Jacksonville, FL. June 02, 1913.
titleStmt.author: Joseph E. Lee

respStmt.name: Hazel D. Gillis and Janaya Ferrer

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Earth M.M. White Collection" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

msContents.summary: Author writes an announcement about Judge Joseph E. Lee's resumption of the general practice of law.

objectDesc.p: An announcement typewritten on a single sheet of paper.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Collection." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.

div.p:
formerlyFormerly Municipal Judgemunicipal judge of Jacksonville, Florida from 1887 to 1889 and
who was Collector of Customscollector of customs from 1890 to 1894, and from 1897 to 1898, and
Collector of Internal Revenuecollector of internal revenue from 1898 to 1913, begs to announce that he
has resumed the general practice of law with offices at No. 32 East Beaver
Street, Jacksonville, Florida. He will practice in Statestate and Federalfederal Courtscourts,
and before the Executive Departmentsexecutive departments at Washington.
